product_overview: An AI-driven platform designed for educational institutions and examiners to upload, evaluate, and manage exam papers across multiple exam types including IGCSE, IELTS, O-Level, and A-Level. It leverages cutting-edge AI technologies for automated marking, comprehensive results management, and insightful analytics, all within a secure and user-friendly web application.
core_goals: Provide a robust AI-powered exam evaluation system that automates marking from uploaded exam papers and mark schemes.
Support multiple exam types with customizable grading criteria and paper generation capabilities.
Enable secure role-based authentication and access control for examiners and administrators.
Offer a seamless user experience with file upload, interactive PDF viewing, and real-time evaluation feedback.
Maintain comprehensive results history with search, filter, and export functionalities for record-keeping and analysis.
Incorporate analytics and reporting features for performance metrics and administrative insights.
Ensure high security, error handling, and performance optimization throughout the application.
Provide draft management and recovery to improve user workflow and prevent data loss.
key_features: Supabase-based authentication system with role-based access control, admin registration, and session management.
Multi-file upload system supporting PDF and image inputs with validation and preview features.
AI Exam Evaluator powered by Google Gemini AI to analyze uploaded exam papers and mark schemes and generate detailed evaluation results.
Advanced PDF processing tools for page-by-page analysis, question extraction, and an interactive navigation-enabled PDF viewer.
IGCSE-specific question paper generator supporting multiple paper types and PDF export capabilities.
Results management system that tracks evaluation history, supports search/filter functions, and allows data export.
Analytics dashboard providing usage statistics, evaluation performance metrics, and administrative reports.
Auto-save and draft recovery system for managing ongoing evaluations and preventing data loss.
Comprehensive state management with custom hooks to maintain evaluation and application state coherently.
Access control mechanisms to enforce evaluation limits, role-based permissions, and usage tracking.
Responsive UI components including tab-based navigation, dashboard, settings, and error/loading handling components.
Security measures including rate limiting, secure APIs, and production-ready environment configurations.
Support for multiple exam types (IELTS, O-Level, A-Level, IGCSE) with exam-specific configuration and grading.
Performance optimization features including monitoring and service worker integration.
Robust testing infrastructure covering unit, integration, and component tests for reliability.
user_flow_summary: User registration and login flow with role-based permissions handled via Supabase authentication.
Admins can register and manage user roles and permissions.
Users upload multiple exam paper files and mark schemes through a validated file upload interface supporting PDFs and images.
The AI Exam Evaluator processes the uploaded files and generates evaluation results using Google Gemini AI.
Users review evaluation results and have access to detailed scoring cards and question-specific feedback.
Users can generate IGCSE question papers with customizable settings and export them as PDFs.
Users track and search through evaluation history, filtering results and exporting data as needed.
Admins access detailed analytics and usage reports via the dashboard for performance insights.
Auto-save functionality preserves evaluation drafts and provides recovery options to users.
Users navigate the platform via a responsive UI with tabbed navigation and error handling for a smooth experience.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication with enforced role-based access control and session management.
Accurate AI evaluation results consistent with uploaded exam papers and mark schemes.
File upload system correctly validates, previews, and processes supported file types without errors.
PDF viewing and question extraction functions operate smoothly with responsive navigation features.
IGCSE question paper generation produces valid, printable, and correctly formatted PDF exam papers.
Evaluation history records all relevant data and supports search, filter, and export functionalities.
Analytics dashboard displays correct usage statistics and evaluation metrics with up-to-date data.
Draft auto-save and recovery system reliably preserves user work under different usage scenarios.
All UI components respond correctly to user interactions with no critical performance issues.
Security measures effectively prevent unauthorized access and handle edge cases such as rate limiting.
Performance benchmarks meet acceptable thresholds on load times and responsiveness.
All core functionalities are covered by comprehensive automated tests with passing results.
